<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Conrasu Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2778) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector. You are trained with the [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75), [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), and [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10). You also gain access to all uncommon [conrasu](/Traits.aspx?ID=343) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial conrasu weapons are simple weapons and advanced conrasu weapons are martial weapons.
name: Conrasu Weapon Familiarity
